title: How to Redeem Codes in miHoYo's Honkai: Star Rail to Get Extra Rewards

steps.title: Open the phone menu while in-game.
steps.content: Open the phone menu while in-game. If you're not sure how to do this, you can press Esc on a keyboard or the Options button on a controller.

steps.title: Click on the three-dot button next to your name.
steps.content: Click on the three-dot button next to your name. It's in the top part of the menu. If you're on a controller, you will have to scroll up to select it.

steps.title: Select Redemption Code.
steps.content: Select Redemption Code . A text box will pop up for you to enter the code.

steps.title: Enter your code and click Redeem.
steps.content: Enter your code and click Redeem . If you have a keyboard, you will have to use that to enter your code, even if you're playing with a controller . If you're on a console, the on-screen keyboard will pop up. If you are on a computer and you have the code copied, you can paste it into the field.

steps.title: Head to your mailbox to claim your rewards.
steps.content: Head to your mailbox to claim your rewards. The mailbox is the envelope icon on the right-hand side of the screen. If you have already claimed a code, you will get a mail message that states as such.

steps.title: Go to the HoYoverse Honkai:
steps.content: Go to the HoYoverse Honkai: Star Rail code redemption site. If you don't want to boot up the game to redeem a code, you can redeem it online with the HoYoverse redemption site . [1] X Research source

steps.title: Click Log In in the upper right.
steps.content: Click Log In in the upper right. Ensure you've logged in before you try to redeem a code.

steps.title: Select your server from the dropdown.
steps.content: Select your server from the dropdown. You can select America, Europe, Asia, or TW,HK,MO.

steps.title: Type in your character's nickname.
steps.content: Type in your character's nickname. This is the name of your Trailblazer. If you didn't set a name, your character is likely the default name of Caelus (for a male avatar) or Stelle (for a female avatar).

steps.title: Enter a redemption code.
steps.content: Enter a redemption code. You can type it out or copy and paste it.

steps.title: Click Redeem.
steps.content: Click Redeem . Once a code is redeemed, the rewards will get sent to your in-game mailbox where you can claim them once you've opened the game again. If you have already claimed a code, you will get a mail message that states as such.

steps.title: STARRAILGIFT.
steps.content: STARRAILGIFT. This is the only current Honkai: Star Rail redemption code that doesn't expire. When you redeem this code you get 50 Stellar Jades, 2 Traveler's Guides, 5 Bottled Sodas, and 10,000 credits.

steps.title: KBQBEP3L8823.
steps.content: KBQBEP3L8823. This redemption code is currently active for November 2023 and will get you 50 Stellar Jades and 10,000 Credits.

steps.title: PT8TF72MQ93X.
steps.content: PT8TF72MQ93X. This redemption code is currently active for November 2023 and will get you 50 Stellar Jades and 10,000 Credits.

steps.title: Patch livestreams.
steps.content: Patch livestreams. When a new patch is announced in Honkai: Star Rail, miHoYo/HoYoverse will host a livestream to go over the new features, characters, and more. There are always redemption codes handed out during the livestream, but they are only available for a limited time, so make sure you redeem them right away!

steps.title: HoYoLab.
steps.content: HoYoLab. HoYoverse has an online community called HoYoLab , and users will post redemption codes on the site. These posts are usually tagged with the words "redeem," "redemption," "code(s)," and "HSR" or "Honkai: Star Rail."

steps.title: Social media.
steps.content: Social media. Sometimes the Honkai: Star Rail or miHoYo /HoYoverse official social media accounts may post redemption codes. These codes usually expire, but last longer than the livestream codes.

steps.title: Reddit.
steps.content: Reddit. Users in the Honkai: Star Rail Reddit post redemption codes once they have been distributed, so you can check in to find them and get extra rewards.

steps.title: Google.
steps.content: Google. If you google "Honkai: Star Rail redemption codes" a number of sites will pop up sharing what codes are currently available. Keep checking back as new codes are distributed often!
